column4: when you do a netstat -l | grep 10000 does it show your ip-address also?
not unless you had server resolving to your ip address
you will not be able to do that from inside the network; you need to ask a friend to try and connect from OUTSIDE your network
does it say webroot or root?
scratch that! it says www root!
so copy it to the document root typically /var/www/
that's odd. i dont have a /var/www directory
do you have a webserver installed?
then how do you plan to run the webui??
jeez i  need to take the tiem to read more slowly!  it says i need a webserver in bold lol =)
can you recommend a webserver?  lgihtweight is better
apache2 is fine; if you're really constrained for resources lighttpd is the way to go
you want to remove the package or a printer?
